item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: table, td, th { border: 1px solid grey; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border-collapse: collapse; } table {width: 70%; } tr:hover { background-color: #555555; color: white;} Markdown syntax handbook Element Markdown Syntax Heading # H1 ## H2 ### H3 Bold **bold text** Italic *italicized text* Blockquote > blockquote Ordered List 1.
